subject: feat: implement Dashboard V2 with 4-tab structure and urgency/impact visualizations
body:
Major dashboard restructure:
- 4 tabs (Overview, Activity, Work, Health) down from 7
- TAB_MAPPING in JS shows multiple content containers per tab
- Existing render functions continue to work unchanged

New visualizations in Health tab:
- Operational health cards (Security, Reactive%, Weekend%, After Hours%)
- Urgency Distribution bars (Planned/Normal/Reactive)
- Impact Distribution bars (user-facing/internal/infra/api)

Updated Overview tab:
- Replaced Complexity and Files cards with Avg Urgency and % Planned
- Trend indicators show urgency direction (lower is better)

Docs updated with implementation progress and remaining work.
title: implement Dashboard V2 with 4-tab structure and urgency/impact visualizations
